page.title: 06OCCUPATIONS BLAISDON
page.content: {Population }81 adults, 11 children, 11 teenagers Most workers{commute}to Gloucester, Cheltenham or Mitcheldean.Jobs include mobile motor mechanic,electrician, general practitioner, speech therapist 2 agricultural contractors, herdsman, teacher, C of E priest, local government employee, retired post master,Health authority planner, dentist, anaesthetist, industrial nurse, gardener, area manager for Calor Gas, crane operator, retired milk recorder , Bursar ,house parent, teacher at Salesian school,technical lecturer,forester,farm worker,retired librarian,draughtsman,fruit contractor instrument mechanic,captain of banana boat,solicitor's office manager,civil servant(rtd) ,surveyor(rtd),manager of plastics' factory,m.d.Brick works. Asst at handicapped school.
